1.2.name: wordpress/cyfe
1.2.description:
This plugin allows website owners to easily integrate their WordPress analytics into their Cyfe dashboard.

This enables you to monitor and share your WordPress blog stats (e.g. users, posts, comments) in real-time with Cyfe, the all-in-one business dashboard.

To use Cyfe with your blog, simply install this plugin and sign up for a free account at http://www.cyfe.com
